_metadata.description: Mountains Area - reorganized from World1 export

rooms.long_description:
You are standing on a rocky path between high, impassible mountains.
Other than the sounds of the wind and an occasional bird cry, nothing
breaks the silence of this desolate landscape. From time to time an
ominous dark shape soars overhead. The town gates lie to the northeast.
Other exits are to the northwest, southeast, and southwest.

room_flags.note: Bitwise OR of flag values from _enumerations.room_flags

room_flags.note: Bitwise OR of flag values from _enumerations.room_flags

rooms.long_description:
You're in a damp, poorly lit cave. Glowing lichens and fungi provide an
eerie greenish light. The exits are to the north, northwest, and southeast.

room_flags.note: Bitwise OR of flag values from _enumerations.room_flags

rooms.long_description:
You're in a damp, poorly lit cave. Glowing lichens and fungi provide
an eerie greenish light. The exits are to the north and southeast.

room_flags.note: Bitwise OR of flag values from _enumerations.room_flags

rooms.short_description: You are in a clean cave.
rooms.long_description:
This cave is very clean and well kept. It has the look and feel of
the den of a sorceror. The floor of the cave has no trace of dirt or
other litter. There are several items of furniture, all somewhat large
and very sturdy looking. The only exit is to the south.

room_flags.note: Bitwise OR of flag values from _enumerations.room_flags

rooms.long_description:
You're in a damp, poorly lit cave. Glowing lichens and fungi provide
an eerie greenish light. The exits are to the north and south. There
is light to the south.

room_flags.note: Bitwise OR of flag values from _enumerations.room_flags

rooms.long_description:
You're in a damp, poorly lit cave. Glowing lichens and fungi provide
an eerie greenish light. The exits are to the northwest and south.

room_flags.note: Bitwise OR of flag values from _enumerations.room_flags

rooms.short_description: You are in a large cave.
rooms.long_description:
This cave is very large and smells slightly of offal. It has the look
of the den of some wild beast. The floor of the cave is covered with
straw and other litter. The only exit is to the southeast.

room_flags.note: Bitwise OR of flag values from _enumerations.room_flags

rooms.long_description:

room_flags.note: Bitwise OR of flag values from _enumerations.room_flags

rooms.short_description: You are in a filthy cave.
rooms.long_description:
This cave is large and smells strongly of animal dung. It looks as if
it might be home to some wild animal. This cave is filthy and littered
with the broken skeletons of many small animals. The only exit is to the
northwest.
